name: marvel-hooks
description: MARVEL hooks daemon for Claude Code integration

scripts.build: pnpm run test:run && pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run compile && pnpm run bundle && pnpm run validate
scripts.bundle: pnpm run bundle:daemon && pnpm run bundle:cli && pnpm run bundle:analyze && pnpm run bundle:analyze-evaluations
scripts.bundle:client: esbuild src/client.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --format=esm --outfile=dist/client.bundle.js --external:fsevents --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.bundle:daemon: esbuild src/daemon.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --format=esm --outfile=dist/daemon.bundle.js --external:fsevents --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.bundle:cli: esbuild src/bin/cli.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --format=esm --outfile=dist/cli.bundle.js --external:fsevents --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.bundle:analyze: esbuild src/bin/analyze-decisions.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --format=esm --outfile=dist/analyze-decisions.js --external:fsevents --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
scripts.bundle:analyze-evaluations: esbuild src/bin/analyze-evaluations.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --format=esm --outfile=dist/analyze-evaluations.js --external:fsevents --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
